Package ie.gmit.sw.parser

Class SubjectDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.parser.SubjectDatabase
  • public class SubjectDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that stores a mapping of n-grams for each Language that is parsed by the SubjectParser.

      Constructors

      SubjectDatabase()

      Gets a Map containing the most frequently occurring n-grams for a given language.

        public SubjectDatabase()

    • Method Detail

      • size

        public int size()
        Get the total size of the subject database.
        Returns:
        The size of the database

      • add

        public void add​(java.lang.CharSequence s,
                Language lang)
        Adds a given n-gram to the Subject Database. If the n-gram already exists in the DB, its frequency of occurrence is instead incremented.
        Parameters:
        s - The n-gram to be added
        lang - The language the given n-gram belongs to

      • resize

        public void resize​(int max)
        Reduces the number of n-gram entries stored for each language to the most frequently occurring only.
        Parameters:
        max - The maximum number of n-grams to store for each language.

      • getTop

        public java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<java.lang.Integer,​LanguageEntry> getTop​(int max,
                                                                                        Language lang)
        Gets a Map containing the most frequently occurring n-grams for a given language.
        Parameters:
        max - The maximum number of n-grams the new map should contain
        lang - The language the n-grams belong to
        Returns:
        The most frequently occurring n-grams for the Language lang

      • getLanguage

        public Language getLanguage​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​LanguageEntry> query)
        Takes a map of n-grams and calculates which language in the DB is the most likely match.
        Parameters:
        query - The map that will be queried against the database
        Returns:
        The language that best matches the query

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
